question: Which bank has signed agreement with CDSL Commodity Repository (CCRL)?
explanation: Bank Of Baroda has signed agreement with CDSL Commodity Repository (CCRL). This agreement is for pledge financeunder the repository ecosystem for registered/accredited warehouses. The new ecosystem will boost confidence among bankers and other stakeholders like depositors and warehouse service providers. BOB becomes the firstpublic sector bank to become the repository participant.
